heisig_chinese_memo: The higher you go up a forest mountain the less trees there are, that's so u dont mess up with their possition like i do.
heisig_story: A forest is a large expanse of trees, or "trees, trees everywhere," to adopt the expression we used back in frames 22 and 23.
koohiiStory1: The higher you go up a mountain the less trees there are, that´s so u dont mess up with their possition like i do.
koohiiStory2: Another tree planted within a grove turns it into a FOREST.
jp_example_words:
森林(しんりん): forest, woods
森(もり): forest
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This kanji is just the tree radical three times. Just based off this, you should be able to figure it out. This kanji means "forest."
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Makes sense, because a bunch of individual trees is what makes up a forest!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: One tree? No. Two trees? Not enough. I want more (もり) trees, please!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Keep repeating this pattern over and over, continually focusing in on how you need "more" trees to make this forest. For some reason the person working with you only goes up by one at a time, though, so you have to say it a lot (it'll help you to remember, anyways!).
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 林 (はやし、リン чаща, лес).
Ru_trainchinese: sēn: (графема) полный деревьев; темный, мрачный; (книжн.) во множестве
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a wood (林) and a tree (木) makes a forest
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The higher you go up a forest mountain the less trees there are, that's so u dont mess up with their possition like i do.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the three " woods ", like three trees, the ancients mostly represented the majority with three, so it can be understood as many trees. The original meaning is forest. "Shuowen": "Forest, Mu Duoxuan. From Lin Congmu. If you ever read the ginseng." According to Xuanying's "All Classics Sounds and Meanings", Wang Jun changed to "Duomu Changxuan." and annotated: "yan" . and more, Miki also; words elderly, the wood is also a forest, "" jade articles "," Rhyme "and says:" Sen, Longwood Mao "click". Sen "is used to indicate tall, is nearly late usage , Seems to have nothing to do with the original meaning of the creation of characters.

The oracle bone inscriptions are incomplete, the meaning is unknown, "Collection" 11323: " Sen ", suspected to be used as a place name.

" Forest " is extended from the meaning of forest to many appearances, "The Book of Later Han. "Zhang Heng Biography": "Hundred gods are prepared to follow the Xi, and they will ride on the stars." Li Xian's note: "Forest, all the people will follow me." The whole sentence means that many gods follow me, and the vehicles gathered together ride on the stars. In addition, the gloomy and gloomy meaning is derived from the gloomy environment of the forest. Gu Kuang's "Wandering Ziyin": "The silence of the forest."
humanum_short_description_en: From the three " woods ", it resembles the shape of three trees. The ancients mostly represented the majority with three, so it can be understood as many trees. The original meaning is forest.
humanum_full_description:
從三「木」，象三棵樹木之形，古人多以三代表多數，故可理解為很多樹木。本義是森林。《說文》：「森，木多皃。从林从木。讀若曾參之參。」王筠據玄應《一切經音義》改為「多木長皃也。」並注：「言多者，三木也；言長者，木出林上也。」《玉篇》、《廣韻》並云：「森，長木皃。」按「森」用來表示高聳，屬較晚近的用法，似與造字本義無關。

　　甲骨文卜辭辭殘，辭義不詳，《合集》11323：「森」，疑用作地名。

　　「森」從森林之義引申為眾多之貌，《後漢書．張衡傳》：「百神森其備從兮，屯騎羅而星布。」李賢注：「森，眾皃也。」全句指眾多的神都跟隨我，屯聚的車騎星布四方。另又從森林陰暗的環境引申出陰森幽暗之義，顧況《遊子吟》：「眇默諸境森。」
humanum_short_description: 從三「木」，象三棵樹木之形，古人多以三代表多數，故可理解為很多樹木。本義是森林。

從三「 木 」，象三棵樹木之形，古人多以三代表多數，故可理解為很多樹木。本義是森林。《說文》：「森，木多皃。从林从木。讀若曾參之參。」王筠據玄應《一切經音義》改為「多木長皃也。」並注：「言多者，三木也；言長者，木出林上也。」《玉篇》、《廣韻》並云：「森，長木皃。」按「 森 」用來表示高聳，屬較晚近的用法，似與造字本義無關。 甲骨文卜辭辭殘，辭義不詳，《合集》11323：「 森 」，疑用作地名。 「 森 」從森林之義引申為眾多之貌，《後漢書．張衡傳》：「百神森其備從兮，屯騎羅而星布。」李賢注：「森，眾皃也。」全句指眾多的神都跟隨我，屯聚的車騎星布四方。另又從森林陰暗的環境引申出陰森幽暗之義，顧況《遊子吟》：「眇默諸境森。」

According to Xuanying's "All Classics Sounds and Meanings", Wang Jun changed to "Duomu Changxuan." and annotated: "yan" . and more, Miki also; words elderly, the wood is also a forest, "" jade articles "," Rhyme "and says:" Sen, Longwood Mao "click". The oracle bone inscriptions are incomplete, the meaning is unknown, "Collection" 11323: " Sen", suspected to be used as a place name. Li Xian's note: "Forest, all the people will follow me." The whole sentence means that many gods follow me, and the vehicles gathered together ride on the stars. 森字的基本解释

森
sēn
树木众多，引申为众多、繁盛：森林。森立。森森。森然。森郁。
幽深可怕的样子：阴森。森邃。
严整的样子：森严。

森字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sēn］
［《廣韻》所今切，平侵，生。］
(1)树木高耸繁密貌。
(2)众多貌，众盛貌。
(3)满；罗列。
(4)高耸，峙立。
(5)因惊愕而毛发耸起。
(6)寒，凉。
(7)阴沉幽暗貌。
(8)谓森严。

森字的英文翻译

◎ 森
dark, full of trees, gloomy, in multitudes

森字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　森； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页534第11
【廣韻】所令切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】疏簪切，?音參。或作槮。【說文】木多貌。【潘岳·射雉賦】蕭森繁茂。　又盛也。【潘岳·籍田賦】森奉璋以階列。　又植也。【元包·坤辭】丞森囤若。　又【固陵文類】宋杜曾詩：哀猿藏森聳，渴鹿聽潺湲。【註】森去聲，所禁切，音滲。

森字的源字形

森字的起名意思

：本义为树木丛生繁密。泛指树木众多，引申为众多、繁盛。

Sen
sēn
There are many trees, which means that they are numerous and prosperous: forests. Senli. dense. dense. Sen Yu.
Deep and terrible look: ghastly. Senxian.
Strict appearance: Strictly.
Sen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sēn]
["Guangyun" is cut today, flat invaded, and born. ]
(1) The trees are tall and dense.
(2) Numerous appearances, all prosperous appearances.
(3) Full; listed.
(4) Towering and standing upright.
(5) The hair bulges due to consternation.
(6) Cold and cold.
(7) Gloomy appearance.
(8) That is strict.

Source glyph
Sen
Name meaning
: The original meaning is densely overgrown with trees. It generally refers to the numerous trees, which is extended to be numerous and prosperous.

sēn
(缺)
书
字由三“木”构成,形容树木多。
《说文》:“森,木多貌。”左思《蜀都
赋》:“弹言鸟于森木。”引申为“众
多”、“繁密”。《后汉书》:“百神森其
备从兮。”又有“阴暗”义。

糕森森森
Сен
(недостаток)
Слово состоит из трех «лесов», которые описывают множество деревьев.
«Шу Вэнь»: «Леса, леса имеют множество проявлений». «Фу столицы Шу» Цзо Си: «Птицы Таньян в лесах». Продолжение - «много» и «сложное».
«Книга поздней династии Хань»: «Сотни богов готовы следовать за Си». Это также имеет значение «тьма».

sēn
1) лес; чаща
松森 сосновый бор
萧森 густая чаща
2) густой; во множестве
森立 стоять во множестве
3) тёмный; в тени
阴森 в густой тени; тёмный
4) Сэнь (фамилия)
5) Мори (яп. фамилия)

森

Значения

Большая роща, лес

Мнемоника


Три дерева 木 образуют лес.

Radicals: 木  (tree)
Meaning Mnemonic
This kanji is just the tree radical three times. Just based off this, you should be able to figure it out. This kanji means "forest."
Makes sense, because a bunch of individual trees is what makes up a forest!
Reading Mnemonic
One tree? No. Two trees? Not enough. I want more (もり) trees, please!
Keep repeating this pattern over and over, continually focusing in on how you need "more" trees to make this forest. For some reason the person working with you only goes up by one at a time, though, so you have to say it a lot (it'll help you to remember, anyways!).
